sentences.en: Although unemployment rose last month, this is unlikely to dampen down wage demands.
sentences.cn: 虽然上个月失业人数上升，但这不太可能减弱工人要求加薪的意愿。

sentences.en: But all the hardships did not dampen her creativity.
sentences.cn: 但是所有的磨难都没能磨灭她的创作天分和能力.

sentences.en: But gasoline prices climbed last month, which could dampen spending in July.
sentences.cn: 但是,汽油价格上月攀升, 将压低7月份的数据.

sentences.en: Don't dampen his spirits, or he will lose confidence.
sentences.cn: 老给他浇冷水会使他失去自信的.

sentences.en: Don't dampen the enthusiasm of the masses.
sentences.cn: 不要损伤大家的积极性.

sentences.en: I always dampen shirts before ironing them.
sentences.cn: 我总是把衬衫先弄潮湿再熨.

sentences.en: I hate to dampen your spirits but aren't you overlooking a couple of minor points.
sentences.cn: 我不想扫你的兴，但你是否忽视了几个小的问题呢？

sentences.en: I hate to dampen your spirits this way, but here goes. Say when.
sentences.cn: 我不喜欢这样往你的酒里加水, 不过也只好如此了. 你说停我就停.

sentences.en: It would not be right to dampen their spirits.
sentences.cn: 向广大干部和积极分子泼冷水是不对的.

sentences.en: Of course, their friendliness does not dampen their competitive spirit.
sentences.cn: 当然, 他们之间的友好关系并不会影响他们的斗志.

sentences.en: Raising interest rates might dampen the economy.
sentences.cn: 提高利率可能会抑制经济发展。

sentences.en: Researchers are also searching for new drugs to dampen the inflammation process.
sentences.cn: 科研人员还在研究一些新药来阻止发炎的过程.

sentences.en: Substances that inhibit the capsaicin receptors should therefore dampen inflammatory pain.
sentences.cn: 因此,能够抑制辣椒素受体的物质,应该就可以减轻由发炎引起的疼痛.

sentences.en: The light rain dampened the crowd’s enthusiasm.
sentences.cn: 小雨使观众的热情减退了。

sentences.en: The room is uncomfortably hot. Dampen down the fire, please.
sentences.cn: 房门太热, 请把火封住.

sentences.en: The spring dampens the shock of the impact.
sentences.cn: 弹簧减缓碰撞造成的震动。

sentences.en: While gathering this information, you also want to dampen their expectations.
sentences.cn: 在收集资讯的同时, 你也要想办法冷却卖家满心的期待.

words.tran_cn: [航][电子][机] 阻尼器；[车辆] 减震器；气闸
使潮湿；使阻尼；使沮丧，抑制

trans.tran_cn: 弄湿，减弱，抑制（热情、激动等）
trans.tran_en: to make something such as a feeling or activity less strong
